Title: Relates to the penalty for the abandonment of animals
Summary: Provides that the penalty for the abandonment of animals is a misdemeanor, punishable by imprisonment for not more than one year, or by a fine of not less than five hundred dollars nor more than one thousand dollars, or by both.
LawCode: Amd ยง355, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the penalty for the abandonment of animals
